title: Dual Mechanism with Graded Energy Storage in Long-term Aqueous Zinc-Ion Batteries Achieved by Polymer/Vanadium Dioxide Cathode
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02557A, Paper
Zhihang Song, Yi Zhao, Huirong Wang, Anbin Zhou, Xiaoyu Jin, Yongxin Huang, Li Li, Feng Wu, Renjie Chen
Composite materials based on vanadium oxides have been widely used in aqueous zinc-ion batteries (AZIBs). However, due to the low energy storage activity of ligand materials, composite electrodes are faced...
